reviewText: I ordered this book by mistake.  It was not by the author that I thought it would be.  My bad.  To my wonderful surprise it turned out to be maybe one of, if not THE most important E-books that I will ever listen to.

I hoped this program would be a useful introduction to the notion of paradigms and what constitutes a paradigm shift.  It was not.
I have a client, a manager, who gets stuck with problems by trying to just step in and do the work herself.  She will not be successful until can step back, get a new perspective on the problem and her paradigm, and find a higher level solution.

This DVD program will not help her at all in that regard.
